title: NJ Hoops College Season Preview Stories
text: NJ Hoops College Season Preview Stories Jay Gomes Talk about it in the njhoops Message Boards There are colleges at all levels in NJ. There are eight Division 1 schools including teams in the top conferences as well as some mid and low major schools. There are four Division 2 schools that play in the Central Atlantic Collegiate Conference.Ten teams compete in the New Jersey Athletic Conference, a premier Division 3 league. There are other four other small colleges. There are 17 NJ junior colleges broken down into Division 2 and Division 3.We started posting our preview stories over a week ago and will continue with daily stories planning to finish by Thanksgiving.All 42 NJ college were previewed individually and some other preview stories were posted as well. You can click on the link to get the skinny on all the NJ schools.New stories will be posted daily DIVISION 1 TEAM PREVIEWS
